name: Wrap the Crap
description:
Wrap some craps to solve some puzzles. A game created for the Social Distancing Gamejam with the theme of toilet paper. Kick, dash and hop your way through a dank poop filled bathroom to aquire additional toilet paper in this 2D puzzle platformer.

WRAP-THE-CRAP is original version that was submitted to the gamejam while WRAP-THE-CRAP-POSTGAMEJAM is the enhanced version made with several improvements and bug fixes.

Game developed by UTS student Kyle Hammer. Special thanks to Riley Smythe for producing the pixel art used in the project, Asten Jago for assisting in the design phase and Bradley James with the post game jam testing.
